an2.23:1: "Bhikkhus, these two misrepresent the Tath훮gata. Which two?One who explains what has not been stated and uttered by the Tath훮gata as having been stated and uttered by him, and one who explains what has been stated and uttered by the Tath훮gata as not having been stated and uttered by him.
